alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 11 at 6:22PM EDT until August 11 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 621 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Lorain, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Elyria around 630 PM EDT. North Ridgeville around 645 PM EDT. Avon Lake around 650 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Sheffield and Avon. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
